channel.title: GOW2-HOrde Guide-GOW2
channel.description:
not sure if this is the right place, but here is a guide on how to beat the horde for xbox 360 gears of war 2.
first off, the characters. their are characters that run fast, and characters that will run slow. why is this important? because if something is chasing you, [mauler etc..] are u guna run you're fat ass slow? of haul ass outta their..any way
Fast Characters.. 1)Baird 2)Carmine 3)Marcus
Slow Characters.. 1)Dizzy 2)Ti 3)Dom ----------------------------------- weapon setup ------------------------------------ ok so if you're going into a team, on xbox live and what not, you're going to want to have these classes:
/Snipers. Weapon Setup *Sniper Rifle *torque Bow [or shot gun, you're choice] *Ink Grenade. *Magnum
/Machine Gun Man Weapon Setup *Lancer *Shot gun *Grenades *The Automatic pistol thing
/Bazooka Man *Bazooka, Boomers Weapon *Shotgun *Gernade *Magnum
/Mortar Man *Mortar
/Mulcher *Mulcher the automatic weapon, that Grinders drop --------------------------------------------------------------- the monsters ---------------------------------------------------------------- now, i don't know what the wave orders are for the monsters, but here is a list that spawn
*Wrenches *Snipers *Morters *tickers *Kantus *cyclops *blood mounts *boomers *maulers *grinders *boomer butchers *boomer flamethrowers *drones *grenaiders *Nemacyst *palace guards *theron guards
----------------------------- weapons available ----------------------------- *Lancer Assault Rifle *Snub Pistol *Gnasher Shotgun *Longshot Sniper Rifle *Grenades -smoke gernades -ink gernades -gernades *Torque Bow *Hammerburst *Revolver *Boomshot
------------------------------ the trick to not die.. ----------------------------- once u get onto level 10, blood mounts are going to start spawning. these are the most leading causes of deaths, because their are only a few guns that can kill them..thankfully, on wave 9, maulers start spawning, and you can set them up to make it so no monsters can get into you're safe house. you're going to want a safe house, so you can all be together. so on wave 9, about 4 maulers spawn. you kill them pickup theirs shields, and plant them by using (LT)+(A). plant them around the barricade , so that you can go out further, and you won't have to move them you can just hop the barricade. so, the bloodhounds won't get around and you'll be home free. when grinders, boomer, butchers,etc..start spawning, they will be able to get close, just use you're shot gun, torque bows etc..in order to kill them. now, on each end of the wave, leave at least 1 monster alive, so that you're team can grab ammo, gernades, and collect and swap out guns if needed.
-------------------------------- keeping you're players alive -------------------------------- HOUSES!!!!!!!
------------------------------- tips -------------------------------- *when being a sniper, always have some one by you so if you get shot down, you can get revived by them.
well, thats all i have now..i'll put more up later, or post stuff in comments :) hope this helped?

item.title: GOW2-HOrde Guide-GOW2
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

not sure if this is the right place, but here is a guide on how to beat the horde for xbox 360 gears of war 2.

first off, the characters. their are characters that run fast, and characters that will run slow. why is this important? because if something is chasing you, [mauler etc…] are u guna run you’re fat ass slow? of haul ass outta their…any way

Fast Characters…
1)Baird
2)Carmine
3)Marcus

Slow Characters…
1)Dizzy
2)Ti
3)Dom

weapon setup

ok so if you’re going into a team, on xbox live and what not, you’re going to want to have these classes:

/Snipers.
Weapon Setup
*Sniper Rifle
*torque Bow [or shot gun, you’re choice]
*Ink Grenade.
*Magnum

/Machine Gun Man
Weapon Setup
*Lancer
*Shot gun
*Grenades
*The Automatic pistol thing

/Bazooka Man
*Bazooka, Boomers Weapon
*Shotgun
*Gernade
*Magnum

/Mortar Man
*Mortar

/Mulcher
*Mulcher
the automatic weapon, that Grinders drop

the monsters

now, i don’t know what the wave orders are for the monsters, but here is a list that spawn

*Wrenches
*Snipers
*Morters
*tickers
*Kantus
*cyclops
*blood mounts
*boomers
*maulers
*grinders
*boomer butchers
*boomer flamethrowers
*drones
*grenaiders
*Nemacyst
*palace guards
*theron guards

weapons available

*Lancer Assault Rifle
*Snub Pistol
*Gnasher Shotgun
*Longshot Sniper Rifle
*Grenades
-smoke gernades
-ink gernades
-gernades
*Torque Bow
*Hammerburst
*Revolver
*Boomshot

the trick to not die…

once u get onto level 10, blood mounts are going to start spawning. these are the most leading causes of deaths, because their are only a few guns that can kill them…thankfully, on wave 9, maulers start spawning, and you can set them up to make it so no monsters can get into you’re safe house. you’re going to want a safe house, so you can all be together. so on wave 9, about 4 maulers spawn. you kill them pickup theirs shields, and plant them by using (LT)+(A). plant them around the barricade , so that you can go out further, and you won’t have to move them you can just hop the barricade. so, the bloodhounds won’t get around and you’ll be home free. when grinders, boomer, butchers,etc…start spawning, they will be able to get close, just use you’re shot gun, torque bows etc…in order to kill them. now, on each end of the wave, leave at least 1 monster alive, so that you’re team can grab ammo, gernades, and collect and swap out guns if needed.

keeping you’re players alive

HOUSES!!!

tips

*when being a sniper, always have some one by you so if you get shot down, you can get revived by them.

well, thats all i have now…i’ll put more up later, or post stuff in comments hope this helped?

Read full topic
